ProjectTitle: Niche-specific BMP-SMAD responses in lymphatic endothelium

For data sharing you can also use KU Leuven RDR: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr

15/07/2022
This is not fit for purpose for an FWO fellowship. FWO expects you to write a Data Management Plan using their template. You can use DMPonline KU Leuven to write this, or a Word version template. Further info here: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/dmp
